dreisoft.tresos.lib2.api.options

Class Options

  • java.lang.Object
    • dreisoft.tresos.lib2.api.options.Options

  • public class Options
extends java.lang.Object
    Global options that configure the public API are manged by this class. This class allows to configure logging of API usage errors and exeception handling. It also provides access to the global OutputStream useable for debugging output which could be linked to tresos Console View for example.

    The main functionality controlled via the Option is the handling of errors during calls to the public API: 

     Options.setLogErrors(true);
 Options.setThrowsExceptions(true);
    See Overview for more details.

    Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

    Since:
    2008.a

      • setLogErrors

        @Deprecated
public static void setLogErrors(boolean logErrors)
        Deprecated. do not use
        Set to true if errors resulting from an API call should be logged to the ErrorLog (OPT_LOG_ERRORS)

        WARNING: This method should not be used for users of the Public API as changes to this flag and not reseting severely changes the functionality of other applications using the Public API.

        Since:
        2008.a

      • getLogErrors

        public static boolean getLogErrors()
        Returns:
        true if error resulting from an API call should be logged to the ErrorLog (OPT_LOG_ERRORS)
        Since:
        2008.a

      • setThrowExceptions

        @Deprecated
public static void setThrowExceptions(boolean throwExceptions)
        Deprecated. do not use
        Set to true to force API calls to throw an APIException if the API method results in an error ( OPT_THROW_EXCEPTIONS).

        WARNING: This method should not be used for users of the Public API as changes to this flag and not reseting severely changes the functionality of other applications using the Public API.

        Since:
        2008.a

      • getThrowExceptions

        public static boolean getThrowExceptions()
        Returns:
        true if APIExceptions are thrown on error (OPT_THROW_EXCEPTIONS)
        Since:
        2008.a

      • setLoggingStream

        public static void setLoggingStream(java.io.OutputStream os)
        Change the stream to which debugging output (like DCtxt.printTree()) is sent to. The logging stream defaults to System.out. To send logging output to the tresos console window use:

        Options.setLoggingStream( Log.getConsoleOutputStream() )

        Parameters:
        os - The output stream used for debugging output, null for System.out
        Since:
        2008.a

      • getLoggingStream

        public static java.io.PrintStream getLoggingStream()
        This method returns the stream used for debugging and logging output.
        Returns:
        The logging stream
        Since:
        2008.a
